name: A winter adventure with Sanae Kochiya
name_original: A winter adventure with Sanae Kochiya
description:
A 2D Collectathon starring everyone's favourite Shrine Maiden. Explore the mountain in search of Magical Snowflakes to with a secret prize.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys- Move

Z- Jump/ Advance Text

X- Throw object

Shift- Dash

Up- Interact

Created for Touhou Fan Game Jam 10.
